content:
```xml
<repairs>
DEL_EDGE | [rm] | -
</repairs>
```

This repair operation removes the relationship `TAKES_MEDICATION` between the patient Earle679 and the medication HCTZ 25 MG Oral Tablet, as it contains an ingredient (exemestane) to which the patient is allergic. This ensures that the person is not treated with a medicine containing an allergen they are sensitive to.
